column4: DR Willis do you know where I could download a PS2 emulator to play the newest Final Fantasy games if you could help me I would appreciate it very much.
Does anyone know where to get a Working PS2 Emulator for Linux?
Does anyone know where I can get PS2 Emulator for Ubuntu?
I have only found for Windows
and I cannot use wine to open it gets buggy
Thanks
Sorry - no matches. Please try some different terms.
Pelo! Help I cannot find
Sorry - no matches. Please try some different terms.
psxemu is the playstation 1 its not the second
maybe i'm thinking of psX
http://psxemulator.gazaxian.com/
no promises! they can barely emulate ps1 properly let alone ps2!
because there are about 1000 linux's
dev-c++ is an IDE. you don't need to mess with an IDE to build wares
actually you just need to run "make" :)
no, "make" is a tool you have on your system for "making" stuff
in the source tree, there are "Makefile"s that tell "make" how to build it
so it's usually just a case of ./configure --whatever-options-you-want-(or-not); make; sudo make install
if you install the package "build-essential", download the tarball you want
ok, extract the archive you downloaded with the source
now is there a readme? :)
